item.title: Bitcoin ETF holders and treasury firms stack protection against price crash below $60,000, Deribit says
item.description: Market participants with long-term vision are buying downside protection.

item.title: XRPL Foundation patches ‚Äòcritical' flaw that almost made it to mainnet

item.title: Australian crypto execs upbeat on progress despite lingering issues

item.title: Two arrested after South Korean cops lost $1.4M in Bitcoin
item.description: Local police seized the Bitcoin in 2021 but stored it in a third-party wallet that was later compromised, with the theft going unnoticed for four years.

item.title: Polymarket bettors appear to have insider-traded on a market designed to catch insider traders
item.description: At least 12 wallets collectively made over $1 million betting on the outcome of ZachXBT's investigation before the findings went public, with one trader turning a $0.14 average entry on shares into $411,000 in profit.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren, OCC Chief Spar Over Trump-Linked Crypto Bank Bid
